messages.content: Write code. with full functionality, descriptive sections, good design,vibrant colors, for the images add https://source.unsplash.com/featured/?{prompt here} to the src. Html should be without html, body, head and script tag. Wrap html code with ---starthtml--- ---endhtml---, css code with ---startcss--- ---endcss--- and javascript code ---startjs--- ---endjs---. And ---startcss--- ---endcss--- and javascript code ---startjs--- ---endjs--- will not be between  ---starthtml--- ---endhtml---
